events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit at all. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's issue was identified as a refund request based on their mention of returning the jacket and receiving money back.
Support agent Emily has been assigned to handle this customer's refund request to ensure prompt service.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out. I'm here to help you with the return and refund process for your jacket purchase.
Could you please provide your order number and let me know if the jacket has any tags attached or if it has been worn?
My order number is 987654321, and I have not worn the jacket. The tags are still attached, so it is in perfect condition.
Thank you for the info. You can send the jacket back via our prepaid shipping label. Once received, we'll issue a full refund to your original payment method.
Great! That sounds easy and convenient. I appreciate your help in making this process smooth for me.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account shortly.
Just checking in to ensure you received your refund smoothly. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund has been successfully issued and no further concerns were raised, we are closing this support case now.
We have sent a short survey to gather your feedback about your support experience. Your opinion helps us improve.
